Anyone who loved and appreciated the original

the re-release.

Lucas and Speilberg will burn in the hottest circle
of hell for their constant tampering year after 
year.   (The latest bullshit:  Lucas is going to 
go back to Star Wars V: Empire Strikes Back
and REPLACE the puppet yoda with the computer
animation version.)    We need to contribute to
a fund to feed Lucas more fatty foods so he dies
of a heart attack as soon as possible.
